Faqs.Question: What areas do you cover?
Faqs.Answer: TLC Carpets proudly cover Essex & London, however customers within East Lonon and South Essex can expect a quicker turn around time.

Faqs.Question: Do you supply and install?
Faqs.Answer: We Supply and Install. We have accounts with all major retailers, and our installers are qualified to install all materials.

Faqs.Question: What types of flooring do you do?
Faqs.Answer: Carpet, Sisal, Flatweave, Wood, Laminate, Vinyl and LVT. We may aswell say 'Everything!'

Faqs.Question: How long does the whole process take?
Faqs.Answer: From initial measure to completed installation, we dutifully aim for 3 weeks.

Faqs.Question: Do you offer a free measuring service?
Faqs.Answer: Our measures are 100% free of charge if you live inside East London or South Essex. Otherwise, a nominal fee will be charged on a case by case basis.
